text: Rapolas is a Lithuanian masculine given name, a cognate of the name Raphael, and may refer to: *Rapolas Ivanauskas (born 1998), Lithuanian basketball player *Rapolas Šaltenis (1908–2007), Lithuanian journalist, author, translator, and teacher *Rapolas Skipitis (1887–1976), Lithuanian politician and attorney ==References== Category:Masculine given names Category:Lithuanian masculine given names
title: Rapolas
